summary: The module defines a collection of lightweight utility functions and classes used in test suites to exercise and benchmark various call patterns, including regular, static, class, and Cython-implemented methods, as well as generators, exception handling, and GIL management. It also provides simple eventâ€‘counting and profiling helpers.
business_intent: Enable automated testing and performance monitoring of different function invocation styles and profiling configurations within the codebase, facilitating validation of monitoring tools and Cython integration.
